content.rendered:
CASEY CONCRETE

Convenient Locations
Casey Concrete has a rich history of serving the Roaring Fork Valley’s ready-mix concrete needs for over 20 years. With plant locations in Carbondale, Silt, and Eagle County, we service the Roaring Fork, Aspen, Snowmass, Redstone, Marble, Glenwood Springs, and the I-70 corridor East to Vail and West to Parachute, Colorado. Superior Products
We supply the municipal, commercial, industrial, and residential markets with a wide array of products targeted to each market’s needs. Our proven field-tested mix designs ensure that the end product exceeds your expectations. Advanced Technology
Our batch plants are computerized, ensuring accurate delivery of the correct materials and quantities to build our mixes. In addition, we employ newer delivery trucks so deliveries are on-time. We also implement radio communications and GPS tracking capabilities across our fleet and sales staff. Some of the Industry’s Best People
Our dedicated team is knowledgeable of state and local specifications. We are continuously involved in extensive training and educational programs to remain on top of the latest industry developments. We have the highest quality standards in the products we produce and are committed to the safety of our team through the encouragement of ACI certification.

Our locally-owned and operated company is fully invested in the communities it serves. Through memberships with regional industry affiliations and support of local tradesmen and businesses, Casey Concrete continues its long-standing commitment to the community.

ADDRESS

14682 Highway 82
Carbondale, CO 81623

Capabilities

VISIT SITE CONTACT US
